# AnimationFormatString.OSLogMessage

**Structure**

A log message that includes an animation tag.

## Declaration

```swift
@frozen struct OSLogMessage
```

## Overview

An [doc://com.apple.os/documentation/os/AnimationFormatString/OSLogMessage] structure contains a message that you construct from a string interpolation or string literal. This message includes an additional animation tag. Don’t create this structure directly. The system creates one automatically when you log a message using the [doc://com.apple.os/documentation/os/os_signpost(_:dso:log:name:signpostID:_:_:)-nez5] function

## Creating a Format String

- **init(stringLiteral:)**: Creates a log message using a string literal.

## Conforms To

- BitwiseCopyable
- Copyable
- ExpressibleByExtendedGraphemeClusterLiteral
- ExpressibleByStringLiteral
- ExpressibleByUnicodeScalarLiteral
